channel.title: DBGroup Team on DBGroup
channel.description: Recent content in DBGroup Team on DBGroup

item.title: Jiaping Cao
item.description: Cao Jiaping is a current PhD student in the Department of Computing at the Hong Kong Polytechnic Unversity, supervised by Dr. Ken Yiu. He is also a member of Flink System Group in SUSTech DBGroup.

item.title: Chaozu Zhang
item.description: Chaozu Zhang is the of the 17th undergraduates in DBGroup, majoring in visualization under the leader of Dr.Shen. He is majoring in sampling technology for large-scale trajectory data.

item.title: Zelin Li
item.description: My name is Zelin Li and I am a BSc student in the Database Group of the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at Southern University of Science and Technology. My research focuses on face image super-resolution.

item.title: Peiqi Yin
item.description: Peiqi Yin is an undergraduate student in Database Group in Southern University of Science and Technology. He is following tutor Bo Tang. He was an ACM member of SUSTech and he is interested in algorithm. He have won silver medal of ICPC (Shanghai) 2020, silver medal of CCPC (Qinghuangdao) 2020, gold medal of GMCPC (Guangdong Macao) 2020, fastest solved award of ICPC (Xuzhou) 2019.

item.title: Weibao Fu
item.description: Weibao Fu is an undergraduate student in Database Group in Southern University of Science and Technology, who is following tutor Bo Tang and Dan Zen. He is awarded the First Class of the Merit Student Scholarship for two consecutive years (2019 and 2020). The current research direction is the super-resolution on face images and there is a paper submitting in CVPR Face Super-Resolution with Highway for High Frequency Signal.

item.title: maozunyao
item.description: My name is Mao Zunyao and I am a undergraduate junior student of Southern University of Science and Technology. I am now working on system direction, and implementing a GPU-integrated distributed system.

item.title: Jian Zeng
item.description: Jian Zeng received his master degree from Sun Yat-sen University. He was a visiting researcher at State Key Laboratory of Internet of Things for Smart City (University of Macau).

item.title: Keming Li
item.description: KemingLi received the bachelor’s Degree in the Computer Science Department of Southern University of Science and Technology. He had a internship at Huawei Telecommunications equipment company as a developer.

item.title: Yan Xiao
item.description: Dr. Yan Xiao received his Ph.D. degree from The Chinese University of Hong Kong under the supervision of Professor James Cheng.

item.title: Bo Huang
item.description: Bo Huang is a member of Database Research Group. He is supervised by Prof. Bo Tang.

item.title: Bo Tang
item.description: Bo Tang received the PhD Degree in the Department of Computing at the The Hong Kong Polytechnic University. He was a member of Database Research Group. He was supervised by Dr. Ken Yiu. He was a visiting researcher at MonetDB group (Amsterdam) and Microsoft Research Asia (Beijing). Before that, he obtained his BEng degree in computer science from Sichuan University.

item.title: Dan Zeng
item.description: Dan Zeng received the B.E. and Ph.D. degrees in computer science and technology from Sichuan University in 2013 and 2018, under the supervision of Prof. Zhisheng You and Prof. Qijun Zhao. Since 2012, she participated in ‘3+2+3’ Joined Study of Bachelor and Doctoral Degree program of Sichuan University (Top 5%). She worked as a post-doc research fellow in the Data Management and Biometrics (DMB) Lab at the University of Twente, the Netherlands from 2018 to 2020, under the supervision of Prof.

item.title: Haotian Liu
item.description: Haotian Liu received the Bachelor’s degree at Southern University of Science and Technology (SUSTech). He is one of the 16th undergraduates in DBGroup, and supervised by Prof. Bo Tang. He joined DBGroup at 2019. He is a postgraduate students in SUSTech now.

item.title: Lan Lu
item.description: Lan Lu is an undergraduate in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at Southern University of Science and Technology. She joined in DB group in 2020 and is now a member of Similarity Search group supervised by professor Bo Tang and Dr. Xiao Yan.

item.title: Mingji Han
item.description: Mingji Han is a senior undergraduate student majoring computer science at Southern University of Science and Technology. His research interest mainly lies on database system including graph database, modern hardware and query processing.

item.title: Nan Deng
item.description: Nan Deng is a senior student of Southern University of Science and Technology and is now on supporting GPU execution engine on Flink.

item.title: Wendi Luan
item.description: Wendi Luan is an senior undergraduate student in CSE Department @ SUSTech. Her major research interest is in data visualization.

item.title: Wentao Ning
item.description: Wentao Ning is a PhD student under SUSTech-HKU Joint PhD Programme, supervised by Prof. Bo Tang (SUSTech) and Reynold Cheng (HKU). He received his BEng degree from the Department of Computer Science and Engineering, Southern University of Science and Technology (SUSTech) in July, 2020.

item.title: Zhengxin You
item.description: Zhengxin You is a college student of SUSTech. He joined DBGroup in the middle of 2020. Now he’s working on big data visualization.

item.title: 邓楠
item.description: 我是南方科技大学计算机系大四学生，在数据库组的课题是基于Flink实现GPU版本的sql执行引擎。

item.title: Ting Sun
item.description: My name is Ting Sun and I am a BSc student in the Database Group of the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at Southern University of Science and Technology. My research focuses on streaming data processing.

item.title: Wen Jiang
item.description: Wen Jiang is an undergraduate student in Database Group in Southern University of Science and Technology, who is following tutor Bo Tang and Dan Zen. The current research direction is the super-resolution on face images and video super resolution.

item.title: Zhiyuan Lin
item.description: A member of CV joining the DB group in September, 2020
